title: Portrait of a Gentleman
credit_line: Bequest of Mrs. J. Willis Dalzell
provenance_text:
J. W. R. Crawford, New York, NY and New Rochelle, NY; Knoedler & Co.New York, NY, 1917 [1]; John Levy Galleries, New York, NY, 1917; Mrs. J. Willis Dalzell (Mary Beer Dalzell) [c.1849-1929], Pittsburgh, PA, until February 13, 1929 [1]; her bequest to Museum, February 1929.
 
Notes:
[1]. Stock no. 14070; see Knoedler Archive, The Getty Research Institute. See also correspondence with Ellis Waterhouse in curatorial file.

Under review by CGK
